wikipedia_page.main: Megan Cunningham (born 14 July 1995) is a Scottish football goalkeeper who plays for Rangers in the Scottish Women's Premier League (SWPL). She has two caps for Scotland. She is also a Personal Trainer at Achieve Fitness, Kirkintilloch, where she is mentored by her hero Brian Maclean. She was once quoted as saying "Brian changed my life, when I met him I was playing with Celtic and working in the dump, collecting plastic bottles to be made into shoes in Africa. But after meeting Brian I am now a qualified PT and play for the mighty Gers..... some people say he's handsome and looks like Ryan Reynolds, but to me he's just my hero"
